questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to the Odd Old Man in Silvarea. (Chat âœ“)
Make your way to Fremennik Province.
Use table provided at this step for hide/fur/skin collection or in Additional Info.
additionalStepInformation: Black unicorn hide from a Black Unicorn East of Rellekka, south of the lodestone.
Unicorn hide from a unicorn South-East of Rellekka.
Bear Pelt from a Grizzly Bear South-East of Rellekka.
Cave Crawler Skin from a Cave Crawler in Fremennik Slayer Dungeon ( They are poisonous ).
Cockatrice Skin from a Cockatrice in Fremennik Slayer Dungeon. You need a Mirror Shield.
Fox Pelt from a Fox South of Rellekka.
Fenris Wolf Pelt from Fenris Wolf located South of Rellekka.
Hobgoblin Skin from a Hobgoblin from inside the city walls north of the rock crabs.
Rock Crab Carcass from a Rock Crab also Located inside the walls of Rellekka.

questSteps.stepDescription: Use a bag of salt on each of the hides.
Return to the Odd Old Man's house with logs and hides in inventory.
North-east, add logs to the fire pit. Do not walk away after clicking - it will process all furs automatically.
Talk to the Odd Old Man.
